name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForCognitiveDisorders
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Cognitive Disorders
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to cognitive disorders and is listed as a neurologic disorder on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes cognitive disorders. It includes cognitive developmental delay and cognitive deficits as a sequela of another disorder (e.g., Cognitive deficit due to and following ischemic cerebrovascular accident).),(Exclusion Criteria: )
